data.title: The Love Bug on DVD
data.meta_description:
Hello, everyone.
I'm new to the forum, and I'm looking forward to lots of great future DVD and film discussion here!;) 
Anyway, I saw the new Vault Disney...
data.text:
William V

Auditioning

Joined

May 10, 2002

Messages

1

Hello, everyone.

I'm new to the forum, and I'm looking forward to lots of great future DVD and film discussion here!

Anyway, I saw the new Vault Disney releases today, and I thought "The Love Bug" was coming out too. Is this true? Or has it not been announced yet?

Thanks for any help with this!

Jeff Ulmer

Joined

Aug 23, 1998

Messages

5,582

Welcome to the forum.

It is scheduled for 2003. If the current Vault Disney titles are any indication, it will be well worth the wait.

I can only hope THE ABSENT MINDED PROFESSOR/SON OF FLUBBER are in the works too, not to mention THE SHAGGY DOG. And how about THAT DARN CAT?

Considering how involved Hayley Mills has been with the first Vault titles, I'm sure they are doing something with That Darn Cat, though how and when they'll release it is another matter.

I think I saw The Shaggy Dog in the same list as The Love Bug ; to be released next year as part of the Vault series. I'm waiting for both, myself.

I hope Disney also starts looking at Toby Tyler, or Ten Weeks With the Circus & the original Escape to Witch Mountain.
